document_data.name: Darius Bormul VI
document_data.mainbody: '''Darius Bormul VI''' was an envoy of [[Amn]]'s [[Council of Six]] in [[Maztica]] in [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Lord Darius was concerned about the apparent disinterest of Governor [[Cordell]] in maintaining the Council's hold over Maztica after the settling of [[New Waterdeep]]. He also funded the new colony of Lord [[Drakosa]].
